title: Truck is love. Truck is life.
body:
Pics from the first day I returned with her to my buddy's condo and thanked him for the ride and assist.

https://i.gyazo.com/a7e96b88b6bfa5d9940105e12f0a8451.jpg

I shoulda washed her first...

https://i.gyazo.com/3793d011a07ae78c73d245a8ab6eb54c.jpg

She's purrty though. It was his recommendation as far as the right type of truck to be a work truck for the gig he got me into (bless Josh), and I couldn't be happier with the pick to be honest. I've owned other cars. Even financed once before, but this is my baby.

Whip out yo whip GD. Whatchu ridin?
